document.full_text: rescuers used picks, shovels and their hands to tunnel through dirt, wood, metal and rock in a frantic effort to reach the miners after an explosion on tuesday at the mine in coahuila state.
document.title: the americas: mexico: fate of 9 miners unknown
lines_and_colors: rescuers used picks, shovels and their hands to tunnel through dirt, wood, metal and rock in a frantic effort to reach the miners after an explosion on tuesday at the mine in coahuila state.
